hero.title: Professional Accounting Services
hero.subtitle: Your Trusted Business Partner
hero.description: We provide a complete range of accounting services for small and medium-sized enterprises, sole traders, and international companies.

accounting.title: Accounting
accounting.description: Accounting services for small and medium enterprises, sole traders, freelancers, and international companies
accounting.fullDescription: Our accounting service includes complete bookkeeping for entrepreneurs, tradesmen, and non-profit organizations. This includes posting invoices, bank statements, VAT calculation, fixed asset management, and preparation of all necessary statistical and financial reports according to legal regulations.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: We provide support related to your business operations to ensure compliance with legal requirements
consulting.fullDescription: Expert consulting is key to the development of any business. We provide tax consulting, tax liability optimization, profitability analysis, and advice on choosing the most favorable business model. We help you make informed decisions that reduce risks and increase profits.

formation.title: Company Formation
formation.description: Guiding the company formation process, consulting, assistance in finding business premises
formation.fullDescription: We help you in every step of starting your own business. Choosing between Ltd, Simple Ltd, or trade, preparing documentation for the notary, opening a bank account, and registration in relevant registries (Tax Administration, Pension and Health Insurance). We save your time and ensure a proper start.

reporting.title: Reporting
reporting.description: Data available at any moment of business operations – balance sheet, P&L, customer and supplier balances
reporting.fullDescription: Timely information is the foundation of successful management. We prepare monthly and quarterly business reports, balance sheets, profit and loss statements (P&L), and track customer and supplier balances. Our reports are clear, precise, and tailored to your needs for making strategic decisions.

payroll.title: Payroll Processing
payroll.description: Payroll processing, record keeping and regulatory compliance, preparation and implementation of internal policies
payroll.fullDescription: Employee administration and payroll processing require precision and monitoring of constant legal changes. We handle employee registration/deregistration, payroll calculation of salaries, allowances, and bonuses, preparation of JOPPD forms, and keeping records of work and vacations. Your employees will be paid accurately and on time.

selfEmployed.title: Self-Employed
selfEmployed.description: Accounting and consulting for self-employed professionals, preparation of tax forms, business control
selfEmployed.fullDescription: We specialize in supporting self-employed professionals (flat-rate tax). We keep the revenue book (KPR), monitor the threshold for entering the VAT system, prepare the annual PO-SD form, and provide continuous advice on contributions and legal limits. We enable you to focus on your work while we take care of the paperwork.
